subject: Pro X grounding
description_text:
Hi,

I have the pro x pedals and am having weird electrical issues on my setup. I read that grounding the control box may help. Is this right? If so how do I do that?

I have a damaged wheel base. 

Thank you

conversations.body_text: Hi Ethan Saks,  If this happens, it indicates that the computerâ€™s grounding is not reliable, possibly because a three-prong plug was not used with a three-prong wall outlet. You can refer to the post below: connect the computer case to the stand, and connect the control box to the metal screws on the pedals. This should resolve the disconnection issue.  https://github.com/SHWotever/SimHub/wiki/USB-Issues-Troubleshooting https://support.gomezsimindustries.com/portal/en/kb/articles/understanding-emi-and-grounding
